subject: Olympic Games
Discrimination
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee will require future Olympic host cities to abide by rules that forbid any kind of discrimination, a move prompted by the outcry caused by Russia’s adoption of a law banning so-called gay propaganda before the Sochi Winter Games.
